requiredEquipmentExplanation: The workout video explicitly states in the title, description, and tags that it is a 'No Equipment' workout. The title of the video emphasizes 'All Standing, No Jumping, No Equipment,' indicating that the exercises can be performed without any equipment. The description reiterates this by mentioning 'No Equipment, No Jumping,' confirming the bodyweight-only nature of the exercises. The tags like 'no equipment workout' and 'standing workout' further support that no additional equipment is needed. Additionally, top comments discuss aspects of the workout such as specific exercises (e.g., squat pulses, backward lunge) without mentioning any equipment. Thus, the analysis concludes with very high confidence that this workout requires no equipment.
